section.title: Installing the Metrics Agent
section.para: For monitoring SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring, a Metrics Agent must be installed on your SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring host.
As a prerequisite for installing the agent on your SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring host, the offline resources, the OpenStack extensions, and the Monitoring Service must have been installed.
